intro:
The spotlight shines once again on Sixtar Gate, introducing STARGAZER, a vibrant blend of rhythm action and engaging storytelling!

Adventure Mode
Step into the shoes of the Captain (the protagonist) as you team up with the free-spirited guitarist Dorimi (voiced by Eunjo Lee / Kanako Nomura). Together, uncover a brand-new story set in the Sixtar Gate universe.

Immersive Rhythm Gameplay
- 4-Lane System: Perfect for rhythm game newcomers, this intuitive layout ensures a smooth and satisfying experience.
- Voltage Overdrive System: Rack up combo chains to supercharge your score and achieve record-breaking performances.

Massive Song Library
Enjoy over 40 original tracks reimagined in band style, featuring beloved Sixtar Gate songs and new favorites. Stay tuned for free and paid DLC updates, promising fresh content and challenges to keep the beat alive.

Earn, Unlock, Play
Collect in-game currency, Volts, through gameplay and unlock new tracks to expand your playlist.

Features
- Over 40 tracks with additional DLC updates planned.
- Unique Voltage Overdrive system for high-scoring combos.
- Intuitive 4-lane rhythm mechanics tailored for accessibility and fun.
- Engaging Adventure Mode with a heartfelt story.

Let the rhythm guide you as you embark on the ultimate musical adventure in Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER!
